definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Shehuo is a continuation of an ancient tradition of offering sacrifices to Land Gods and Fire Gods.
sentences.chinese: 社火是古代祭祀土地神和火神活動的延續。

sentences.english: It was the day of the festival for Vulcan , the Roman god of fire.
sentences.chinese: 這天是慶祝羅馬火神伏爾肯的節日。

sentences.english: Dongfang Shuo replied that the Fire God loved red lanterns more than anything.
sentences.chinese: 東方朔回答說火神最愛大紅燈籠。

sentences.english: When are the Vulcans arriving for First Contact?
sentences.chinese: 什麼時候火神纔會來跟我們進行第一次接觸呢？

sentences.english: He took the controls last Sunday with co-pilot Kevin Rumens.
sentences.chinese: 上週日他與副駕駛員凱文駕駛火神進行8分鐘的表演。

sentences.english: Zhu Rong is the God of Fire in ancient Chinese mythology.
sentences.chinese: 祝融在中國古代神話中是火神。

definition: Nirvana (in Buddhist scripture)/Lord Brahma (the Hindu Creator)
Golden Crow/the sun/the three-legged golden crow that lives in the sun
Vermilion Bird (the seven mansions of the south sky)
occult force/the power of a God or spirit
